statements: SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics
SELECT id, page_views FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5
SELECT id, conversion_rate FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE page_views BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE engagement_rate < 0.3
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, page_views ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, page_views, conversion_rate FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE page_views > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE page_views BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, engagement_rate FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE engagement_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY id DESC, engagement_rate ASC
SELECT id, conversion_rate FROM ContentPerformanceMetrics WHERE conversion_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM page_views;
SELECT page_id, view_count FROM page_views WHERE view_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM page_views ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, engagement_rate FROM content_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM page_views WHERE view_count > 500 ORDER BY view_count DESC;
SELECT page_id, view_count FROM page_views WHERE view_count > 100 ORDER BY view_count DESC;
SELECT timestamp, view_count FROM page_views WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT content_id, engagement_rate, conversion_rate FROM content_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT page_id, timestamp, view_count FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, conversion_rate FROM content_metrics WHERE content_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT page_id, views FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 1;
SELECT time_stamp, rate FROM engagement_rates WHERE rate > 0.5 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE page_id = 2 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT page_id, SUM(views) AS total_views FROM page_views GROUP BY page_id;
SELECT page_id, AVG(rate) AS average_rate FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY page_id HAVING AVG(rate) > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM page_views ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT page_id, views FROM page_views WHERE views > 100 ORDER BY views ASC;
SELECT page_id, rate FROM engagement_rates JOIN conversion_rates ON engagement_rates.page_id = conversion_rates.page_id WHERE rate > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(page_id) AS total_pages, AVG(rate) AS avg_rate FROM engagement_rates GROUP BY page_id HAVING total_pages > 5;
SELECT page_id, DATE(time_stamp) AS date, SUM(rate) AS total_rate FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY page_id, date HAVING total_rate > 50 ORDER BY total_rate DESC;
SELECT page_url, page_views FROM PageViews
SELECT page_id, page_url, engagement_rate FROM EngagementRates
SELECT page_id, conversion_rate, date_recorded FROM ConversionRates ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'John'
SELECT page_url, engagement_rate, date_recorded FROM EngagementRates WHERE date_recorded >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PageViews ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, page_views ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT page_url, page_views FROM PageViews WHERE page_views > 1000 AND page_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT page_url, engagement_rate FROM EngagementRates WHERE engagement_rate >= 3.5 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE date_joined BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT page_id, conversion_rate FROM ConversionRates WHERE conversion_rate < 2.0 ORDER BY page_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT page_url, views_count FROM page_views WHERE page_id = 10;
SELECT engagement_rate, timestamp FROM engagement_rates ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM page_views ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT page_url, COUNT(*) AS count FROM page_views GROUP BY page_url ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(conversion_rate) AS total_conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT u.username, c.conversion_rate FROM user_profiles u JOIN conversion_rates c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.conversion_rate > 0.7;
SELECT r.role_name, COUNT(up.user_id) AS user_count FROM user_roles r LEFT JOIN user_profiles up ON r.role_id = up.user_id GROUP BY r.role_name ORDER BY user_count DESC;
